data.name: The Century Plaza
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Built at the turn of the twentieth century, the Century Plaza was at one time as elegant as it was esteemed. Director Eric Lahey took up residence at The run-down Century Plaza Hotel to document this forgotten fragment of society. Stories unravel by those gripped with mental illness, drug addiction, and disease. Their captivating tales and personalities will engross you in their private world.

Director Eric Lahey took up residence at The run-down Century Plaza Hotel to document this forgotten fragment of society. Stories unravel by those gripped with mental illness, drug addiction, and disease.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
